select f.*,store.store_name from member_face_blacklist f left join member_store_info store ON f.store_id = store.store_id where f.deleted = 0
and f.store_id=#{reqVO.storeId}
and locate(#{reqVO.admitGuid},f.admit_guid)>0
and locate(#{reqVO.remark},f.remark)>0
and f.store_id IN (select store_id from member_store_user where deleted = 0 and user_id = #{userId} AND type IN (12,13))
AND f.create_time>=#{reqVO.createTime[0]} AND f.create_time<=#{reqVO.createTime[1]}
order by f.create_time desc
select * from member_face_blacklist where deleted=0 and store_id=#{storeId} and admit_guid=#{admitGuid}
